info.name: CDS Blueprint Processor API Reference
info.description: Shows all resources and endpoints which CDS BP processor currently provides with sample requests/responses, parameter description and other information.

item.name: Blueprint Model Catalog

request.description: Lists all blueprint models which are saved in CDS.
Saves a blueprint model by the given file input. There is no validation of the attached CBA happening when this API is called.

Loads all Model Types, Resource Dictionaries and blueprint models which are included in CDS by default.Before starting to work with CDS, bootstrap should be called to load all the basic models that each orginization might support.Parameter values can be set as false to skip loading e.g. the Resource Dictionaries but this is not recommended.

item.name: Get a Blueprint Model by Name and Version

request.description: Get Meta-Data of a Blueprint Model by its name and version.
Gets the CBA of a blueprint model by its name and version. Response can be saved to a file to download the CBA.

item.name: Download a Blueprint Model by ID

request.description: Gets the CBA of a blueprint model by its ID. Response can be saved to a file to download the CBA.
Enriches the attached CBA and returns the enriched CBA zip file in the response.The enrichment process will complete the package by providing all the definition of types used.

item.name: Enrich and publish a Blueprint Model

request.description: Enriches the attached CBA, validates it and saves it in CDS if validation was successful.

item.name: Search for Blueprints by a Keyword

request.description: Lists all blueprint models by a matching keyword in any of the meta-data of the blueprint models.Blueprint models are just returned if a whole keyword is matching, not just parts of it. Not case-sensitive.Used by CDS UI.

item.name: Delete a Blueprint Model by Name

request.description: Delete a blueprint model identified by its name and version from CDS.
Lists all blueprint models which are saved in CDS in an ordered mode.

item.name: Search for Blueprints by a Keyword in an ordered mode

request.description: Lists all blueprint models by a matching keyword in any of the meta-data of the blueprint models in an ordered mode. Blueprint models are just returned if a whole keyword is matching, not just parts of it. Not case-sensitive. Used by CDS UI.
Validates the attached CBA file and saves it in CDS if validation was successful. CBA needs to be already enriched.

item.name: Search for a Blueprint by Tag

request.description: Searches for all blueprint models which contain the specified input parameter in their tags. Blueprint models which contain just parts of the searched word in their tags are also returned.
Get the workflow of a blueprint identified by Blueprint and workflow name. Inputs, outputs and data types of workflow is returned.
Get all available workflows of a Blueprint by its name and version.

item.name: Get a Blueprint Model by ID

request.description: Get a blueprint model by its internally created ID.

item.name: Delete a Blueprint Model by its ID

request.description: Delete a blueprint model a a given ID. ID is the internally created ID of blueprint, not the name of blueprint.

item.description: Manages all blueprint models which are available in CDS

request.description: Retrieve a config snapshot, identified by its Resource Id and Type. An extra 'format' parameter can be passed to tell what content-type is expected.

item.name: Retrieve all resource configuration snapshots identified by a given resource_id

request.description: Retrieve all config snapshots, identified by its Resource Id, ordered by most recently created/modified date.

item.name: Retrieve all resource configuration snapshots for a given resource type

request.description: Retrieve all config snapshots matching a specified Resource Type, ordered by most recently created/modified date.

item.name: Store a resource configuration snapshot identified by resourceId, resourceType, status

request.description: Store a resource configuration snapshot, identified by its resourceId and resourceType, and optionally its status, either RUNNING or CANDIDATE.

body.raw:
{
    "name": "test-source",
    "dataType": "string",
    "entrySchema": null,
    "resourceDictionaryGroup": "default",
    "definition": {
        "tags": "oam-local-ipv4-address",
        "name": "test-source",
        "property": {
            "description": "test",
            "required": null,
            "type": "string",
            "status": null,
            "constraints": null,
            "metadata": null,
            "value": null,
            "input-param": null,
            "default": null,
            "entry_schema": null,
            "external-schema": null
        },
        "group": "default",
        "updated-by": "sample@onap.com",
        "sources": {
            "sdnc": {
                "description": null,
                "type": "source-rest",
                "metadata": null,
                "directives": null,
                "properties": {
                    "type": "JSON",
                    "endpoint-selector": "",
                    "url-path": "test",
                    "path": "/v4-assigned-ip-list/0/v4-ip-prefix",
                    "input-key-mapping": {
                        "service-instance-id": "service-instance-id",
                        "network-role": "network-role",
                        "v4-ip-type": "v4-ip-type",
                        "vm-type": "vm-type"
                    },
                    "output-key-mapping": {
                        "oam-local-ipv4-address": "v4-ip-prefix"
                    },
                    "key-dependencies": [
                        "service-instance-id",
                        "network-role",
                        "v4-ip-type",
                        "vm-type"
                    ]
                },
                "attributes": null,
                "capabilities": null,
                "requirements": null,
                "interfaces": null,
                "artifacts": null,
                "copy": null,
                "node_filter": null
            }
        }
    },
    "description": "test",
    "tags": "oam-local-ipv4-address",
    "updatedBy": "sample@onap.com"
}

request.description: Save a resource dictionary by dictionary provided.
Search for a resource dictionary by names provided.
Save a resource dictionary by dictionary provided.
Retrieve all config snapshots matching a specified Resource Type, ordered by most recently created/modified date.
Retrieve all config snapshots matching a specified Resource Type, ordered by most recently created/modified date.
Search for a source mapping.
Retrieve a resource dictionary by name provided.
Remove a resource dictionary by name provided.

item.name: Store a resolved template w/ resolution-key

request.description: Store a template for a given CBA's action, identified by its blueprint name, blueprint version, artifact name and resolution key.

item.name: Store a resolved template w/ resourceId and resourceType

request.description: Store a template for a given CBA's action, identified by its blueprint name, blueprint version, artifact name, resourceId and resourceType.

item.name: Get all resolved resources using the resolution key

request.description: Retrieve all config snapshots matching a specified Resource Type, ordered by most recently created/modified date.
Delete all the resources associated to a resolution-key using blueprint metadata, artifact name and the resolution-key.

item.name: Fetch a resource value using resolution key

request.description: Retrieve a stored resource value using the blueprint metadata, artifact name, resolution-key along with the name of the resource value to retrieve.
Lists all available endpoints from blueprints processor API.
